Contact Us
Get in Touch with Finnegan’s Grille & Pub
We’d love to hear from you!
Whether you have questions about our menu, upcoming events, booking a special event, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out.
Our team is here and ready to help make your next visit even better.
Please fill out the form below, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible. Cheers!
Name
Email Address
Message
Submit

About Us
A Place for Good Food, Cold Drinks, and Great Times!
At Finnegan’s Grille & Pub, we believe great food and a welcoming atmosphere are the heart of every memorable gathering. Since opening our doors in September 2020, we’ve proudly served Port Charlotte and our surrounding community with hearty meals, cold drinks, and friendly service that feels like home.
Locally Loved, Family Friendly
Whether you’re stopping in for a casual lunch, a night out with friends, or a family dinner, Finnegan’s is a place where everyone feels like part of the family. Our menu is packed with classic bar favorites, comfort food, and refreshing drinks — and our full-service bar is always ready to pour your favorite beer, craft cocktail, or glass of wine.
Conveniently Located
You’ll find us right in the heart of Port Charlotte, conveniently located next to Staples on Tamiami Trail. Easy to get to, hard to leave — we’re proud to be a favorite neighborhood spot for locals and visitors alike.
More Than a Meal
At Finnegan’s, it’s about more than just great food — it’s about the laughter shared over a burger, the cheers during the big game, and the simple moments that turn into great memories. We’re passionate about creating a place where everyone feels welcome, whether you’re a regular or a first-time guest.
We Can’t Wait to Meet You
Come visit us and see why so many call Finnegan’s their go-to spot for great times and even better meals. We can’t wait to welcome you!
